# auto-resolve anonymous columns for simple route
"select unknown_col from user join user_extra on user.id = user_extra.user_id"

  "QueryType": "SELECT",
  "Original": "select unknown_col from user join user_extra on user.id = user_extra.user_id",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "Route",
    "Variant": "SelectScatter",
    "Keyspace": {
      "Name": "user",
      "Sharded": true
    },
    "FieldQuery": "select unknown_col from `user` join user_extra on `user`.id = user_extra.user_id where 1 != 1",
    "Query": "select unknown_col from `user` join user_extra on `user`.id = user_extra.user_id",
    "Table": "`user`, user_extra"
  }
}
